name: Care 4U Medical
overview:
Incorporated in the year 2011 at New Delhi (India), we “Care 4U Medical Devices” are bestowed in trading, exporting, distributing and supplying a wide range of BIPAP Machine, Oxygen Concentrator, CPAP Machine, Pulse Oximeter, etc.

Our Products: Portable Oxygen Concentrator Oxygen Cylinder & Component CPAP Machine BIPAP Machine Pulse Oximeter Nebulizer Home Medical Device Medical Accessories Medical Equipment On Rent

Our Aim: “Our aim is to outsource the latest medical instruments from different suppliers and make them available to the indigenous consumers. We effectively facilitate the procurement process to reduce the gap between the consumers and the suppliers in a mutually beneficial method”

Vendor Base: In order to offer quality range to our precious clients, we are linked with prestigious vendors of the market. These vendors are selected with the help our procurement agents, who accomplish in depth market research to select them.

Our Quality: We believe in offering quality-centric products to our clients; hence we offer world-class products to our precious clients. Our certified vendors manufacture entire range of products using high grade raw material and the advanced machinery.

Application Areas: Our entire range of Medical Equipment has been manufactured to meet the varied needs and requirements of our clients in a number of demanding industrial applications.
